docstring.long_description:
Send a message to a CAN device periodically. This block should be compatible with all devices that support the CAN interface.
A connection to the device is required. Use a CAN_CONNECT block to connect to a CAN device.
docstring.short_description: Send a periodic message to a CAN bus.

parameters.name: CAN_address
parameters.description: The CAN device address to connect to.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: A list of messages to send to the CAN device.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The period in seconds between messages.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Approximate duration in seconds to continue sending messages. If no duration is provided, the task will continue indefinitely.
